forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. Southwest wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. Southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours of the night, a blanket of clouds softly envelops Boston, the air tinged with a crispness that whispers of autumn’s slow embrace. As the remnants of day fade into slumber, temperatures graze the lower limits of comfort, hovering around a soothing 48 degrees. A gentle southwest breeze stirs, weaving its way through the streets, lending a distinct freshness to the atmosphere, as the city twinkles in a muted cacophony of nighttime lights.

Come morning, a transformation awaits. The clouds will part like a curtain, revealing a canvas of blue that invites decision-making. The day promises a pleasant warmth, nudging towards 67 degrees, as the sun bathes the city in its mellow glow. A brisk wind will accompany the sunshine, occasionally rallying in gusts—perfect for invigorating those morning strolls along the Charles River or a leisurely coffee on a sun-drenched patio. Dressing in layers will be prudent; a light sweater or jacket will complement your ensemble, while comfortable shoes invite a casual exploration of nearby parks or the meandering streets lined with historical charm. Engage in simple pleasures—a visit to a local bookstore, an impromptu gathering of friends, or simply savoring the day’s serenity with a good book in hand. Today is a soft reminder to relish every moment as warmth once again envelops Boston, beckoning all into its gentle embrace.
